name: rinzai
description: A framework for generating coding questions and checking them for style, construction, and function.
author: Ryan Lynch (lynch.r.j@gmail.com)

scripts.browserify: mkdir -p dist && browserify --standalone Rinzai src/rinzai.js -o dist/rinzai-browser.js && uglifyjs -o dist/rinzai-browser.js dist/rinzai-browser.js
